## clear variable

Clears/fills the canvas' current clip rect with given char (default: 0x20 / space). If `reset` is true, first resets all internal state (clipping, format, style), so that entire canvas will be cleared.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clear: (canvas: Canvas, reset?: boolean, code?: string | number) => void
```
